## Extract MCMC posterior draws

```{r}
#| label: polite

library(tidyverse)

polite <- read_csv("data/winter2012/polite.csv")

polite
```


```{r}
#| label: hnr-bm

library(brms)

hnr_bm <- brm(
  HNRmn ~ attitude,
  family = gaussian(),
  data = polite,
  cores = 4,
  file = "data/cache/hnr_bm",
  seed = 2913
)
```

```{r}
#| label: hnr-bm-draws

hnr_bm_draws <- as_draws_df(hnr_bm)
hnr_bm_draws
```
